page.title: 15Georgina's Sunday Outing
page.content: I woke up at in unfamiliar room because I was staying with my auntie in{Pamber Heath,}near{Reading.}My sister, Uncle Tony and I took the two dogs, Linus and Taron, for a walk on the Common. Afterwards we all went to {Tadley's Sunday Market.}It was very big, with a lot of stalls, mostly selling clothes and shoes. We bought some fruit and two pairs of shoes and then went home for dinner. In the afternoon we went walking in the woods. We walked by a stream where it was very boggy. The walk was about two miles long and nearly everybody's legs were aching before long. When we got back we packed, said goodbye and left for the car journey home. There were traffic delays so it took us about three hours.
